result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daenil T. Montgomery

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on December 13, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

9:41 AM cases 21CF851, 22CF590, 22CF884, 22CT121 called and held via Zoom. Defendant Daenil T. Montgomery appeared by video, in custody at Dodge Correctional.  Attorney Roger M Hillestad in court for Daenil T. Montgomery.  Prosecuting attorney Monica A Fallon in court for the State of Wisconsin. In 22CF590, 22CF884: A preliminary hearing is scheduled for 12/13/22 at 2:00 pm. Other files to track along.

Montgomery appeared by video, in custody from Dodge Correctional Facility.  Attorney Roger M Hillestad in court for Daenil T. Montgomery. Attorney Hillestad requests a new return date as he needs time to review discovery with the defendant.
Hearing scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 09:30 am.

records.addlTxt:
11:11 AM cases 21CF851, 22CF590, 22CF884, 22CT121 called. Prosecuting attorney Afton Brianna Lewis Ms. in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Daenil T. Montgomery appeared by video, in custody. 
In 22CF884, 22CF590: waives reading of the complaint and time limits for the preliminary hearing. 
All files: Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on 8-22-22 at 1:30 PM.
Hearing scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Notice of Hearing - Return to Sender, Attempted Not Known, Unable to Forward

Conditions:
No contact with R.S., G.Q., K.S. or her residence. 
No contact with anyone involved in illegal drug activities, except in a therapeutic setting.
No acts or threats of violence against anyone.
Defendant not to drive without a valid driver's license.
Defendant not to use/possess any non-prescribed medications or drug paraphernalia.
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services.
(Covers 22CF590, 22CT121, 21CF851)

10:15am Cases called: 21CF851, 22CF590 & 22CT121. Defendant Daenil T. Montgomery in court, in custody via Zoom from the Chippewa County Jail.  Attorney Francis Xavier Rivard in court for Daenil T. Montgomery.  Attorney Andrew Gunderson in court for State of Wisconsin. Warrant executed. Attorney Rivard had withdrawn from these cases due to warrant status of defendant. 
State requests a $500 cash bond. 
Court orders a $1,000 signature bond to cover all 3 cases. Previous conditions apply.
Initial appearance scheduled for August 3, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Initial appearance on August 3, 2022 at 11:00 am.
